name: Nekoard
description:
- Controls
Arrow keys: Move
Space,[Z],A-Button : Shoot

- How to play
Your objective is to get all the balls into the gray area.
While holding the button, the power increases and the cursor moves.
When you release the button, a fish will be launched.
Bounce the ball with the fish to get the ball into the gray area.
Fish are limited, so stock up on fish by picking up canned fish.
When you pick up a star, you turn pink and can bounce the ball off your body.
The apple is worth 30 points.
If you touch the ball, your PW will decrease.
When your PW reaches 0, the game is over.

- Download
https://ni.10-59.com/zip/nekoard.zip

- Artwork
